page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE cont'd
page.content: We've also got a large greenhouse in which we put tomato plants. Dad cut the privet hedge and found a blackbird's nest with some young birds in it so he had to leave it. I helped my dad take our aviary up to our new house. You should have heard the birds whistling in the car. Dad said that I had worked very hard and let me go to Sherwood swimming baths with my sister's boyfriend Paul. When we got home, Paul helped me pack the last of my things , ready to move. On Sunday, I went to Langwith Junction Club with my grandad and dad. I had a glass of shandy and played a few games of pool. When I got home I had my dinner which I really enjoyed.
